markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quenching](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1836)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune counters burning and corrosive agents. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end [persistent acid or fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) affecting you from 15 to 12 (7 with particularly effective assistance).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quenching
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quenching (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 10 (5 with particularly effective assistance).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quenching (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 8 (3 with particularly effective assistance).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quenching (True)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 5 (particularly effective assistance automatically removes the persistent acid or fire damage).
name: Quenching (True)
